Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Limits robocalls to state residents and requires telephone service providers to offer free call mitigation technology to telephone customers
Summary: Limits robocalls to state residents; requires telephone service providers to offer free call mitigation technology to telephone customers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to limiting robocalls to state residents and to require telephone service providers to offer free call mitigation technology to telephone customers
